FindingName: Audit Log Search Function not Enabled
Description: With the function disabled it is harder to find the audit logs you need. Consider enabling it.
Remediation: 1. Log in as an administrator.> 2. Navigate to the Office 365 security & compliance center by going to https://protection.office.com > 3. In the Security & Compliance Center, expand Search then select Audit log search. > 4. Click Start recording user and admin activities next to the information warning at the top. > 5. Click Yes on the dialog box to confirm.
